__e: To think I'd ever live to see the day a daughter of mine would be down on her knees in the dirt digging for onions.
Get down on your knees with your hands behind your head.
Down on your knees, put your hands behind your back.
Down on your knees, put your hands behind your back.
Get down on your knees with your hands behind your head.
Yeah, you're on your knees and you say...
I want him to get on his hands and knees and say he can't live without me.
So Shelly's down on his knees, right... and he's pulling out this money from a safe on the floor... and I'm standin' there... and I'm lookin' at it, right? Like, "Holy fuck!"
You went down on your knees before him... the man I hate more than anybody in the world!
I want your people to see you kneel before me here.
I'm the one; I should go down on my knees to you.
Always going weak at the knees in front of a beautiful woman.
When I saw that man down on his knees, praying to God... I just couldn't go on.
- Let's go in the back. I'm tired of watching guys sit up and b-b-beg you.
Why are you taking the dress off?
